content.question: The developments depicted on the map most strongly affected American Indians by

choices.label: increasing armed conflict with United States citizens and threatening traditional ways of life
promoting economic growth through new lines of trade with previously isolated communities
encouraging the federal government to recognize American Indian sovereignty
reducing contact with White settlers due to the abandonment of old overland routes to the Pacific

content.answer: increasing armed conflict with United States citizens and threatening traditional ways of life

topic.text: 6.3: Westward Expansion - Social and Cultural Development

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
